messages.content: ComfyUI-Unique3D is a set of custom nodes that integrate Unique3D into ComfyUI, allowing for high-quality and efficient 3D mesh generation from a single image.
What is the recommended way to try ComfyUI-Unique3D?
It is highly recommended to download a new ComfyUI bundle to try ComfyUI-Unique3D.
What software might be required to set up ComfyUI-Unique3D on Windows?
Visual Studio Build Tools might be required to set up ComfyUI-Unique3D on Windows.
What are the steps to set up ComfyUI-3D-Pack?

The steps to set up ComfyUI-3D-Pack include: 1. Cloning the repository in the custom_notes folder, 2. Running the install_windows_portable_win_py311_cu121.bat file, and 3. Running ComfyUI to check if the installation was successful.
What are the steps to set up ComfyUI-Unique3D?

The steps to set up ComfyUI-Unique3D include: 1. Cloning the repository in the custom_notes folder, 2. Downloading the trition whl and placing it under the ComfyUI-Unique3D folder, 3. Running the install_windows_portable_win_py311_cu121.bat file, and 4. Downloading and extracting the weights to the appropriate directory.
Where can one find example workflows for ComfyUI-Unique3D?
Example workflows for ComfyUI-Unique3D can be found in the workflow folder, such as example-workflow1.json and example-workflow2.json.
What custom nodes are currently available in ComfyUI-Unique3D?
ComfyUI-Unique3D currently has three custom nodes: Unique3DLoadPipeline, Unique3DRun - MVPrediction, and Unique3DRun - Geo Reconstruct.
What are some other extensions developed by the creator of ComfyUI-Unique3D?

The creator of ComfyUI-Unique3D has also developed other extensions for ComfyUI, including ComfyUI-LayerDivider, ComfyUI-InstantMesh, ComfyUI-ImageMagick, and ComfyUI-Workflow-Encrypt, as well as extensions for stable diffusion webui.
